text: Tough Guys is a 1986 American action comedy movie directed by Jeff Kanew and starring Burt Lancaster, Kirk Douglas, Eli Wallach, Dana Carvey, Charles Durning, Darlanne Fluegel. It was distributed by Touchstone Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:1986 comedy movies Category:American action comedy movies Category:1986 action movies Category:Movies set in Los Angeles Category:Movies set in the 1980s
title: Tough Guys
